column5: He got me too,I deleted it but then realized I should have forwrded the link to PITA.If anyone still has the link PITA loves hunters. Joe
He got me too,I deleted it but then realized I should have forwrded the link to PITA.If anyone still has the link PITA loves hunters. Joe
You can say THAT again, Joe.

I was so excited when I got a PM last night. I imagined someone had read my recent posts and was going to hook me up with some demo line    BUT NOOOOOOO!!! it was  Good work mods getting this junk out of here.
I just got a spam PM mods the the name is renegade any other info Just pm... Just letting ya know
yup me too
Uh oh... hes on the letter B... lol
Rene W. Cadene ... go find yourself some morals !
He's been warned.
Got one too.
me too!
Mr. Cadene has left the building.
Thanks Roy! Have a nice night
On behalf of myself and probably the rest of the board...................THANK YOU!!!!!! Spammers are

Sad part is he got what he wanted Roy... Looked like he had about 6 hours to fill a lot of mail boxes with a link to where he wants people.  Maybe that Rick fella has a way to defeat the use of the PM function until you have a set # of posts or a time period. Same should be done to lock the classifieds to a few that have used it and never posted to a thread...one ongoing as a business.
With a name like Rene, and she's a he?... He told me she was a she and I was the only one!!!  Duped again!!!
yup...I got one as well!!
I'm feeling left out... I'm not feeling the love...

Rene (a different one I know) when we were out for coffee one day was asked why he had change his name to Rene when he came over from France or some place like that he said its better then Irene that was his orrigional name

I love spam, I just save it all to a folder and every time I get one from someone I just send them everything that's in my folder. I've got unlimited dialup and I send it at night when I'm going to bed. Probably doesn't do any good but makes me feel better!

Oh, thats who that was. I got the same pm on this board, and on another board where he is an infrequent contributor, and just ignored it because I did not know who "renegade" was, or cared to respond. I was not interested in what he offered.
Just deleted mine!!!  . This site has nothing to worry about. There isn't a better site on the net.
Don't worry Terry.  I've been left out as well.  Now thats rejection when the spammers even skip ya!
Yep, got one too.  Glad this was taken care of so fast.  You mods Rock!!!  Joey
Its funny.... no one ever spams me here.....
LOL - TJ King of the one liners
I got hit on another board as well as I'm sure Dan and Tom did. Quick delete and it was gone, I hope you boys did the same up north Dan.
Got one, hunting site on a fishing board LOL...
